item.title: Bow & Arrow
item.description:
“Hear ye! Hear ye! The king is looking for the best archer in the land! Are you up for a challenge of Bow & Arrow?
Genre Tech Stack Platform Role Status Employer
Arcade, Puzzle Unity, C#, SteamVR VR Sole Developer & Designer Sold (Private Buyer) Kubiyax

Overview

Bow & Arrow is a fairly simple game. As I remember 2017, it was the dawn of VR games. Not that weren’t made before, but mechanics and dynamics still haven’t been fully explored. Many VR arcades looked for a cutting edge, propietry games that players could play only in that specific arcade. Bow & Arrow was one of those games.

item.title: VoX
item.description:
Race! Race! Race! VoX is a unique VR arcade game where you’ll try to out best yourself and your friends. Collect coins, drift and stay on track!
Genre Tech Stack Platform Role Status Client
Racing Unity, SteamVR SDK, Oculus SDK VR, Oculus Unity Developer, Gameplay Designer Completed Kubiyax

Overview

If you worked with VR, guess you could spot the challenge here: How do you handle motion sickness and racing in VR? It’s hard, but doable. Wrapping google anti motion sickness SDK with unity scripts while also improving on that SDK proved to be a viable solution. The game was also hosted on the Indie Playground Exhibition sposored by GameIS.
